structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

law.text: A qualified professional in the area of intellectual disabilities retained by the respondent, or the respondent's parent or guardian, at the expense of the parent or guardian, shall be permitted to witness and participate in any examination of the respondent and may submit findings, if any, to the court.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 49, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 13, effective July 13, 1990.
